devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

params.name: String name of the pool (31 characters/bytes or less).
params.symbol: String symbol of the pool (3 to 5 characters/bytes).

devdoc.title: Pool Registry - Allows registration of pools.

AuthorityChanged(address).notice: Emitted when Rigoblock Dao updates authority address.

MetaChanged(address,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Emitted when pool owner updates meta data for its pool.

Registered(address,address,bytes32,bytes.notice: Emitted when a new pool is registered in registry.

RigoblockDaoChanged(address).notice: Emitted when rigoblock Dao address is updated.

authority().notice: Returns the address of the Rigoblock authority contract.

getMeta(address,bytes32).notice: Returns metadata for a given pool.

getPoolIdFromAddress(address).notice: Returns the id of a pool from its address.

register(address,string,string,bytes32).notice: Allows a factory which is an authority to register a pool.

rigoblockDao().notice: Returns the address of the Rigoblock Dao.

setAuthority(address).notice: Allows Rigoblock governance to update authority.

setMeta(address,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Allows pool owner to set metadata for a pool.

setRigoblockDao(address).notice: Allows Rigoblock Dao to update its address.
